org.fiware.cybercaptor.server.informationsystem.graph

Class InformationSystemGraphVertex

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fiware.cybercaptor.server.informationsystem.graph.InformationSystemGraphVertex

  • public class InformationSystemGraphVertex
extends Object
    Class used to represent a vertex of the InformationSystemGraph
    Author:
    Francois -Xavier Aguessy
